Your Quarterly Notes From Justia Elevate 

Welcome to your quarterly updates from Justia Elevate, our customized platform designed to create websites that work for lawyers.

Announcements

Your Justia Elevate Site Is AMPed Up!

Google spearheaded the Accelerated Mobile Pages project (AMP for short) to improve mobile user experiences through ultra-fast, instantly-loading versions of web pages. Your Justia Elevate site now has its own AMP version, ensuring that your website loads at nearly lightning-fast speeds for the growing ranks of mobile users.

Justia Elevate Platform Updates

Your Premium Yoast SEO Was Updated!

Your Yoast SEO plugin was upgraded to the latest and greatest version! This new version includes some general enhancements, bug fixes, and security improvements.
